title: Crew Show (Plus Donnie Callaway drops in!)
description:
Matt Farah and Zack Klapman talk about their recent drives in the BMW X6 M, Ducati Multistrada V4, Zack chasing drift cars at Gridlife, and fire-breathing cars. Plus, Ferrari restoration expert, Donnie Callaway, drops by with Matt's car and some wisdom.

 

Policygenius saved customers up to $1,055 per year compared to their current home & auto policies. Head to Policygenius.com now to get started.

 

Let Sunday take the guesswork out of growing a greener, more beautiful lawn this Spring. Visit getsunday.com/tire to get $20 off your custom lawn plan at checkout!

 

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @ferrari_1966
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
